nde2.methodcalls.discovery

Class GetDatasetsMethodCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • nde2.methodcalls.BaseMethodCall
      • nde2.methodcalls.discovery.BaseMethodCall
        • nde2.methodcalls.discovery.GetDatasetsMethodCall

  • public class GetDatasetsMethodCall
extends BaseMethodCall
    Encapsulates the GetDatasets() call to the NDE2 web service. Creation follows the Builder pattern.

    This operation enables you to obtain the dataset families associated with your requested subject. The SubjectId will have been obtained from a getSubjects() call. An AreaId is optional, and if supplied, only datasets which have data for this area will be returned.

    Author:
    filip
